name: chess-board-blurry.jpg
description: A full background image of a dark, dramatic chessboard, heavily out of focus with deep shadows and subtle highlights, creating a moody and strategic atmosphere.

name: chess-pieces-retreating.png
description: A group of white chess pieces, including pawns and a knight, captured as if moving backwards in retreat, with a subtle horizontal motion blur effect to indicate movement, on a plain white background.

name: chess-king-attack.png
description: A single, powerful black chess king piece, viewed from a slightly low angle to appear dominant, with a faint, ethereal white glow around its edges, standing on a plain white background.

name: stock-market-crash-graph.jpg
description: A full background image of a digital screen displaying a stock market graph, with a stark, bright red line showing a steep, dramatic downward trend, set against a dark, high-tech background with a slight digital blur.

name: collapsing-buildings-silhouette.png
description: The black silhouettes of a city skyline filled with tall skyscrapers, where several buildings are visibly crumbling and breaking apart with debris falling downwards, on a plain white background.

name: lehman-brothers-building-night.jpg
description: A full background image of the exterior of a large, imposing corporate office building, shot at night. The scene is dark and moody, with sparse lighting from within the windows, creating a sense of emptiness and foreboding.

name: empty-office-desk.png
description: A single, modern office desk with a chair, viewed from the front. The desk is completely bare and clean, suggesting abandonment, with sterile and cool lighting, on a plain white background.

name: vortex-background.jpg
description: A full background image of a dark, abstract vortex, composed of swirling spirals of deep blues, purples, and blacks that pull towards a central point, creating a feeling of chaos and being drawn into an abyss.

name: empty-cubicles-office.jpg
description: A full background image showing a long perspective shot down a row of empty office cubicles. The scene is lit with bright, sterile fluorescent light, emphasizing the cold and desolate atmosphere of the deserted workspace.

name: hands-holding-cash.png
description: A close-up shot of a pair of hands clutching a thick wad of dollar bills very tightly, with whitened knuckles to show tension and fear, under dim, focused lighting, on a plain white background.

name: library-background-warm.jpg
description: A full background image of a classic, grand library with floor-to-ceiling wooden bookshelves filled with old books, illuminated by warm, golden light that creates an inviting, cozy atmosphere, with the entire scene slightly soft and out of focus.

name: kindle-first-gen.png
description: A crisp, clean, studio-lit hero shot of the first-generation Amazon Kindle device, featuring its physical keyboard, positioned at a slight three-quarter angle to look pristine and important, on a plain white background.

name: gutenberg-press.jpg
description: A full background image styled as an old historical engraving of the Gutenberg printing press, with a strong sepia tone, scratches, and film grain to give it an authentic, aged appearance.

name: ancient-books-stack.png
description: A tall, slightly uneven stack of large, ancient-looking books with ornate, weathered leather covers and yellowed pages, viewed from a straight-on perspective, on a plain white background.

name: circuit-board-close-up.jpg
description: A full background image showing a detailed macro shot of a complex computer circuit board. The conductive traces glow with a vibrant blue light against the dark green board, suggesting the flow of data.

name: contract-document-pen.jpg
description: A full background image showing a top-down, close-up shot of a formal contract on a dark wooden table, with an elegant fountain pen resting on the signature line. The lighting is dramatic with deep shadows, implying tense negotiation.

name: factory-assembly-line.jpg
description: A full background image of a modern, bright, and clean electronics factory assembly line, with robotic arms precisely working on devices, creating a high-tech, efficient, and sterile atmosphere with cool blue and white lighting.

name: forest-fire-aftermath.jpg
description: A full background image of a desolate forest landscape after a wildfire, where the ground is covered in ash and trees are charred black and leafless, with a thin layer of smoke lingering in the air to create a stark, somber mood.

name: green-sprout.png
description: A single, tiny, vibrant green plant sprout with two small leaves, emerging from a small patch of dark, cracked earth, symbolizing new life and resilience, isolated on a plain white background.

name: strong-oak-tree.png
description: A bold, black silhouette of a large, majestic oak tree with a thick trunk and a full, wide canopy of branches, conveying strength and stability, on a plain white background.

name: world-map-digital.jpg
description: A full background image of a futuristic, glowing digital world map, where continents are formed by blue light and data points against a dark background, with luminous lines connecting major cities to represent a global network.

name: amazon-logo-strong.png
description: The modern Amazon logo, with the word 'amazon' in black lowercase letters and the iconic orange smile-arrow underneath, presented crisp and solid on a plain white background.

name: book-icons-orbiting.png
description: A collection of stylized, simple icons representing both physical books and Kindle e-readers, arranged in a circular, orbital pattern as if revolving around a central point, on a plain white background.

name: stormy-sea-at-feet.jpg
description: A full background image from a first-person perspective, looking straight down at a dark, stormy sea churning with chaotic, white-capped waves crashing violently below, with the tips of shoes possibly visible at the bottom of the frame.

name: clear-horizon-sunrise.jpg
description: A full background image of a serene and beautiful sunrise over a calm ocean, with the sun just breaching the horizon and casting a brilliant orange and golden glow across the water and a clear sky, creating a peaceful and hopeful scene.
